title: Creation's Echo
content:
Underdark Merchant: Sold by Omeluum in the Myconid Colony after completing his quest Help Omeluum investigate the parasite.

Creation's Echo Notes & Tips

Rarity: Rare Value: 310 Gp. Weight: 1.8 Kg. ID: ??

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandra's Whelm ♦ Ambusher ♦ Arcane Absorption Dagger ♦ Arduos Flame Blade ♦ Artificial Leech ♦ Assassin's Shortsword ♦ Assassin's Touch ♦ Balduran's Giantslayer ♦ Battle-Worn Blade ♦ Battleaxe ♦ Bat
